wikitext.*:
{{book | title=Tolkien Calendar 2002 | image = Tolkien Calendar 2002.jpg | illustrator=[[Ted Nasmith]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] | date=[[4 June]] [[2001]] | format=Calendar | pages=32 | noisbn=[[Special:BookSources/0-00-711189-4|0-00-711189-4]] (UK)
[[Special:BookSources/0-06-621154-9|0-06-621154-9]] (US) | precededby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2001]] | followedby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2003]] }} The '''''Tolkien Calendar 2002''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[4 June]] [[2001]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. ==From the publisher== {{blockquote|The classic Tolkien calendar, this year containing all-new artwork depicting scenes based on the first book of J.R.R. Tolkien’s The Lord of the Rings.

The Tolkien Calendar has become an established publishing event, eagerly looked forward to by Tolkien fans the world over; there is much demand for the annual calendar, with Tolkien calendars from the past 30 years becoming collectors’ items. This year’s continues in that tradition and is the perfect Christmas gift for lovers of fine fantasy art.

The Tolkien Calendar 2002 features 13 brand new paintings from Ted Nasmith, acclaimed Tolkien jacket artist and creator of the illustrated Silmarillion. The paintings are all based on the first volume of Tolkien’s classic masterpiece, The Lord of the Rings, and coincides with the release of the movie from New Line Cinema, guaranteeing greater popularity than ever before.}} ==Illustrations== * January - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Last Sight of Hobbiton.jpg|Last Sight of Hobbiton]]" * February - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Beyond the Old Forest.jpg|Beyond the Old Forest]]" * March - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - A Song in the Trollshaws.jpg|A Song in the Trollshaws]]" * April - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - At the Ford.jpg|At the Ford]]" * May - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Gandalf Escapes Upon Gwaihir.jpg|Gandalf Escapes Upon Gwaihir]]" * June - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Fellowship Leaving Rivendell.jpg|The Fellowship Leaving Rivendell]]" * Centrefold - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Fire on Weathertop.jpg|Fire on Weathertop]]" * July - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - At the Bridge.jpg|At the Bridge]]" * August - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Great Tree at Caras Galadhon.jpg|The Great Tree at Caras Galadhon]]" * September - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Lady Galadriel.jpg|Lady Galadriel]]" * October - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Pillars of the Kings.jpg|The Pillars of the Kings]]" * November - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Boromir.jpg|Boromir]]" * December - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - At the Falls.jpg|At the Falls]]" ==Variants== File:Tolkien Calendar 2002 (Greek).jpg| '''''Τόλκιν Ημερολόγιο 2002'''''
